name: Ursinia
description: Ursinia is a genus of about 40 species of annuals, herbaceous perennials and subshrubs in the family Asteraceae, native to South Africa.Ursinia is popular for its daisy-like, showy flowers that bloom all season long. These flowers attract bees, as well as other beneficial insects. This is one of the easiest plants to grow and is ideal for beginner gardeners.
meaning: The name is given in honor of Johannes Heinrich Ursinus (1608â€“1667), a botanist from Germany who was the author of Arboretum Biblicum.
color_description: Ursinia has yellow, red or orange flowers.
